auth.no_account_yet: I don't have an account yet!

lists.title: Lists
lists.after_creating_desc: After creating this list, you can share it with others and work on it together.
lists.delete_list_confirm_body: Are you sure you want to delete this list and its items? If this list is shared, the other members will be notified. You cannot undo this action.
lists.leave_list_confirm_body: Are you sure you want to leave this list? You will no longer have access to it.

invite.share_prompt_body: Enter the email address of the person you want to invite to this list
invite.join_body: You were invited to this list. Would you like to join?
invite.accept_confirm_body: Are you sure you want to accept this list invite? You will become a member of this list and can add items and receive updates.
invite.decline_confirm_body: Are you sure you want to decline this list invite? You won't become a member of this list and it will disappear from this screen.
invite.invite_sent_body: An email was just sent to the email address provided with a link to join this list!

empty_state.heading: No lists
empty_state.body: Create your first list by tapping the + button above.

validations.invalid_email: That doesn't appear to be a valid email address. Please check it and try again.
